hotels.title: Algiers Sofitel Luxury Near Botanic Gardens with Three Onsite Restaurants & Outdoor Pool
hotels.description: Experience a slice of French elegance in the heart of Algeria's vibrant capital with a stay at a five-star Sofitel oasis. This architectural gem, inspired by the traditional Algerian \"houch\", offers a tranquil retreat amidst the city's energetic pulse. Indulge in a gastronomic journey at the hotel's three restaurants, serving a blend of local and international cuisine. Venture beyond the hotel to explore the historic Casbah quarter, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, or visit the beautiful Hamma Botanical Gardens, located just a stone's throw away. Cool off with a dip in the outdoor pool, or get the blood pumping with a workout at the fitness centre, complete with sauna and relaxation area.
